key.name: all-random
key.description: All effects are chosen randomly, ignoring the selected effect. If None is selected for an event, that event won't be animated.

key.name: time-step
key.description: The amount of time in milliseconds between each render of the animation. The higher the number, the jerkier the movements become. (1 - 400)

key.name: curved-fold-amp-mult
key.description: Fold amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward. (-1.5 - 2)

key.name: curved-fold-zoom-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Curved Fold effect.

key.name: dodge-mode
key.description: Fixed Clicked Window: The window that is clicked on will stay fixed. All Moving: The clicked window will do a dodging action as well. (0 = Fixed Clicked Window, 1 = All Moving)

key.name: dodge-gap-ratio
key.description: Ratio of gaps between dodge start times to focus duration. (0 - 1)

key.name: dream-zoom-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Dream effect.

key.name: glide1-away-position
key.description: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera). (-2 - 1)

key.name: glide1-away-angle
key.description: Angle of window at the end of the animation. (-540 - 540)

key.name: glide1-zoom-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Glide 1 effect.

key.name: glide2-away-position
key.description: Closeness of window to camera at the end of the animation (1.0: Close to camera, -2.0: Away from camera). (-2 - 1)

key.name: glide2-away-angle
key.description: Angle of window at the end of the animation. (-540 - 540)

key.name: glide2-zoom-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Glide 2 effect.

key.name: horizontal-folds-amp-mult
key.description: Fold amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward. (-1 - 3)

key.name: horizontal-folds-num-folds
key.description: The number of horizontal folds that occur in the Horizontal Fold animation. (1 - 50)

key.name: horizontal-folds-zoom-to-taskbar
key.description: Whether the window should zoom to taskbar when minimized with Horizontal Folds effect.

key.name: magic-lamp-moving-end
key.description: On open/close, move magic lamp ending point with the mouse pointer.

key.name: magic-lamp-grid-res
key.description: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases). (2 - 200)

key.name: magic-lamp-open-start-width
key.description: Starting width of open effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp. (0 - 500)

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-moving-end
key.description: On open/close, move magic lamp ending point with the mouse pointer.

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-grid-res
key.description: Vertex grid resolution for Magic Lamp Wavy (Y dimension only). This is the number of points used to define the curves. The higher the number, the smoother the curves. However there will be a loss of performance (CPU usage increases). (4 - 200)

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-max-waves
key.description: The maximum number of waves for Magic Lamp Wavy. (1 - 20)

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-amp-min
key.description: The minimum wave amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp Wavy will have. (200 - 2000)

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-amp-max
key.description: The maximum wave amplitude (size of the waves) Magic Lamp Wavy will have. (200 - 2000)

key.name: magic-lamp-wavy-open-start-width
key.description: Starting width of open effect and ending width of close effect for Magic Lamp Wavy. (0 - 500)

key.name: rollup-fixed-interior
key.description: Fixed window interior during the Rollup animation.

key.name: sidekick-num-rotations
key.description: Number of rotations for Sidekick (plus or minus 10% for randomness). (0 - 5)

key.name: sidekick-springiness
key.description: How spring-like the Sidekick animation should be. (0 - 1)

key.name: sidekick-zoom-from-center
key.description: Zoom from center when playing the Sidekick animation. (0 = Off, 1 = Minimize/Unminimize Only, 2 = Open/Close Only, 3 = On)

key.name: wave-width
key.description: The width of the wave relative to the window height. (0.02 - 3)

key.name: wave-amp-mult
key.description: Wave amplitude (size) is multiplied by this number. Negative values fold outward. (-20 - 20)

key.name: zoom-from-center
key.description: Zoom from center when playing the Zoom animation. (0 = Off, 1 = Minimize/Unminimize Only, 2 = Open/Close Only, 3 = On)

key.name: zoom-springiness
key.description: How spring-like the Zoom animation should be. (0 - 1)
